DataElement.preferredName: Johns Hopkins Frailty Assessment Calculator During Past 2 Weeks Have Been Bowling Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, during the past two weeks, whether they have been bowling.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Johns Hopkins Frailty Assessment Calculator During Past 2 Weeks Have Been Bowling Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized assessment tool that assesses frailty by measuring five phenotypic criteria: unintentional weight loss, exhaustion, low energy expenditure, low grip strength, and/or slowed walking speed. A single score is automatically generated and interpreted as either frail (score 3-5), pre-frail (score 1 or 2), or non-frail or robust (score 0)._At some point in a given period of time._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about whether an individual has been bowling._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized assessment tool that assesses frailty by measuring five phenotypic criteria: unintentional weight loss, exhaustion, low energy expenditure, low grip strength, and/or slowed walking speed. A single score is automatically generated and interpreted as either frail (score 3-5), pre-frail (score 1 or 2), or non-frail or robust (score 0).

Concepts.definition: A standardized assessment tool that assesses frailty by measuring five phenotypic criteria: unintentional weight loss, exhaustion, low energy expenditure, low grip strength, and/or slowed walking speed. A single score is automatically generated and interpreted as either frail (score 3-5), pre-frail (score 1 or 2), or non-frail or robust (score 0).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)
